Label Class Reference
UI Elements

Label Element. More...

#include <Label.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for Label:

Detailed Description

This is a text label. The object automatically changes the font size so that the label will fit within the specified dimensions (if possible).

Implements Element.

Reimplemented in LabelMetric.

void Label::set_text ( const char *  t)
inline

The Label only keeps a pointer to the data. It does not make a copy of the text. So the pointed to value must exist as long as the label does.

Parameters
tA pointer to the text for the label
